name: angular-bootstrap-picker
description: a date picker for angularjs 1.5.x and 4.x and bootstrap 3 with working timezone handling, it uses moment moment-timezone and moment-range

scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-compress && npm run build-compress-amd && npm run build-compress-ts2 && npm run build-compress-amd-ts2
scripts.build-ts2-amd: echo "compiling typescript angular2 amd" && tsc --project src/typescript_ng2/tsconfig-amd.json
scripts.build-dev: echo "building final file for development" && browserify  -i angular -i moment -i moment-range -i moment-timezone build/DatePicker.js > dist/DatePickerFinal.js && ncp src/css/DatePicker.css dist/DatePicker.css
scripts.build-dev-ts2: echo "building final file for development ng2" && browserify -s DatePicker -i @angular -i moment -i moment-range -i moment-timezone dist_ng2/typescript_ng2/DatePicker.js > dist_ng2/DatePickerFinal.js && ncp src/css/DatePicker.css dist_ng2/DatePicker.css
scripts.build-js: echo "building final file" && npm run build-ts && npm run build-ts-amd && npm run build-ts2 && npm run build-ts2-amd && npm run build-dev && npm run build-dev-ts2

author: Werner Punz
